ing: 8 fluid ounces stout beer (such as GuinnessÂ®)
1 fluid ounce Irish cream liqueur (such as Bailey'sÂ®)
1/2 fluid ounce Irish whiskey (such as JamesonÂ®)
des: "This classic St. Patrick's Day drink is simply a shot glass filled with Irish cream and Irish whiskey, dropped into a glass of stout beer. The combination of the three will knock you off your feet!"
ins: Pour beer into a pint glass. Pour Irish cream and Irish whiskey into a shot glass. Gently drop the shot glass into the glass of beer.
